name: Death Point (itch)
description:
I wanted to make a bullet hell game, but I also wanted to make a 3d game. So I made this 3d bullet hell. It's really short, fairly hard, and fun(I hope). It's missing some Due to how short it is there aren't any foundational things you usually find in a bullet hell; bosses, upgrades, multiple levels.

Controls:

W A S D - Move

Space - Jump

Left Mouse Button - Shoot

Right Mouse Button - Melee
